resource-agent.name: fence_ilo4
resource-agent.shortdesc: Fence agent for IPMI over LAN

symlink.name: fence_imm
symlink.shortdesc: Fence agent for IBM Integrated Management Module

resource-agent.longdesc:
fence_ipmilan is an I/O Fencing agent which can be used with machines controlled by IPMI. This agent calls support software using ipmitool (http://ipmitool.sf.net/).
To use fence_ipmilan with HP iLO 3 or HP iLO 4 you have to enable lanplus option (lanplus / -P) and increase wait after operation to 4 seconds (power_wait=4 / -T 4)

parameter.name: auth
parameter.shortdesc: IPMI Lan Auth type (md5, password, or none)

parameter.name: ipaddr
parameter.shortdesc: IPMI Lan IP to talk to

parameter.name: passwd
parameter.shortdesc: Password (if required) to control power on IPMI device

parameter.name: lanplus
parameter.shortdesc: Use Lanplus to improve security of connection

parameter.name: login
parameter.shortdesc: Username/Login (if required) to control power on IPMI device

parameter.name: action
parameter.shortdesc: Operation to perform. Valid operations: on, off, reboot, status, list, diag, monitor or metadata

parameter.name: cipher
parameter.shortdesc: Ciphersuite to use (same as ipmitool -C parameter)

parameter.name: power_wait
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds after on/off operation

parameter.name: delay
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds before fencing is started
